actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and the Interstate Committee Act to authorize reduced-fare transportation on a space available basis for persons who are 65 years of age or older.

summary.text: Authorizes reduced-fare transportation on airplanes, railroads, and motor buses on a space-available basis for persons who are sixty-five years of age or older. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1373(b), 22)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and the Interstate Committee Act to authorize reduced-fare transportation on a space available basis for persons who are 65 years of age or older.
